sentence.Network_en: Breakfast television arrived in British life precisely a decade ago.
sentence.Network_cn: 准确地说，早间电视节目于10年前进入英国人的生活。

sentence.Network_en: I bet you make breakfast and wash up their plates, too.
sentence.Network_cn: 我肯定是你做的早餐并且清洗了他们的餐具。

sentence.Network_en: At breakfast next morning my two grandsons were clamouring to go swimming.
sentence.Network_cn: 第二天早饭时，我那两个孙子嚷嚷着要去游泳。

...·爱德华兹(Ken Edwards)在伦敦举行的“大早餐”(Big Breakfast)活动上，1分钟之内吃下了36只蟑螂。
谷类早餐(breakfast cereals)算是忙碌的现代人的最佳早餐选择。只要把谷类倒入碗中，加半杯牛奶，就能马上送入口中。

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)deal with or defeat someone with contemptuous ease
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)不费吹灰之力对付（或打败）某人

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from the verb break + fast

entry.def: Breakfast is the first meal of the day. It is usually eaten in the early part of the morning.
A cooked breakfast or a hot breakfast is a breakfast that consists of cooked food, such as bacon and eggs.
When you breakfast, you have breakfast.

example.ex: All the ladies breakfasted in their rooms.
example.tran: 所有女士都在她们的房间里吃早餐。

means.word_mean: 1. the first meal of the day (usually in the morning)

stems_affixes.value_cn: 休息, 暂停, 破裂, 突变
stems_affixes.word_buile: break破坏,中断→休息, 暂停, 破裂
break破坏,中断+down向下→n.崩溃,衰弱,破坏
break破+fast绝食,斋戒→n.早餐 v.进早餐

Sentence.sentence: I'd never change a full English breakfast.
The price is ￡60 per person including a continental breakfast.

sentences.en: We breakfasted on eggs and coffee.
sentences.cn: 我们早餐吃的是鸡蛋和咖啡。
这家旅馆通常供应300人的早餐。

jushi.english: He had no money to buy a breakfast.

jushi.chinese: 她匆匆忙忙地吃了早餐。

jushi.english: It's a long time since breakfast.
jushi.chinese: 早餐以后已经过了很长时间了。
